name: Tomb of the Amazon Queen
description:
This is an entry for the LOWREZJAM2016!

Something sinister is stirring deep inside the ancient tomb of the amazons. Care to find out what?

Created by iGS – a bros production! All art and code by Erik. All music by Henrik.

ONLY REQUIRES A KEYBOARD TO PLAY:
Arrow keys: Movement, attacking, and blocking.
Enter key: Use/open doors.
